channel.title: Making hidden mod admin and owners
channel.description: hello i want to make hiddens like 4 mod 5 admin and 6 owner and have all the commands how can i do this what file do i enhance and what do i put in it thank you :D

item.title: Making hidden mod admin and owners
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill
item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

the only problem with having mod admin and owner is you will have to make commands for like pickup if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pickup”) && playerRights > 2), you would have to make like == 2, == 3 ==4, ==6, to avoid hidden mods from accessing certain commands.

Read full topic
